about_the_game:
※Story Summary

Onmyoji, a mysterious profession passed down through the ages, has gradually faded from public view but still exists today. Each Onmyoji team consists of one male "Yangshi," who provides the "Yang energy" needed for exorcism, and one female "Yinshi," who acts as the vessel for this energy, maximizing the power of Yin-Yang.

The story is set in an abandoned Western-style mansion. After receiving a request for an exorcism, "Yinshi" Yue and "Yangshi" Yang arrive, only to find the case is much more challenging than expected. As they gradually exorcise the mansion's spirits, Yue and Yang realize that things are not as simple as they seem, uncovering the mansion's true secrets step by step.

※Character Introduction

Onmyoji - Yue

Yang's girlfriend and partner, Yue is brimming with Yin energy, to the point where she can produce milk even without being pregnant. She wears a bell for purification around her neck and has a sacred mark on her lower abdomen that changes with the influx of Yang energy or Yin force. A homebody who loves dramas and anime, she rarely leaves the house unless necessary, with Yang taking care of most of her daily needs. Yue enjoys her life with Yang and the pleasure of Yin-Yang harmony, showing signs of nymphomania and always being in a state of arousal.

※Game Features

Full voice acting for the female protagonist by a special voice actress

Highly erotic storyline

Over ten HCG sets, all animated

Immersive situational puzzles

Exclusive story written by light novel author Hapi

The game is not scary at all, so feel free to enjoy it

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, All characters are over 20 years old.

name: Exorcist Onmyoji

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6870 DirectX 版本: 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon HD 6870 DirectX 版本: 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound

short_description: This is a light puzzle game where you play as Onmyoji characters "Yang" and "Yue" to exorcise spirits from a mansion. Enjoy immersive, eerie puzzles without any fear!
supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese, English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
